name: Kendri & Keily
description:
This is a tribute game to my two siblings who I had never a chance to meet.

The story is based on a book I'm writing, where the main protagonists are replaced by them.

The Game is currently in Italian, will be translated in English once completed.

1000 Winters ago, a prohpet did predict that the world as they knew it would have ended, the cause would have been an evil magician who will want to rule over it. Yet, not all hope is lost, as new generation of mages will be trained to face him and save the world. Since then, everytime someone did reach their 13th birthday, they would get forced to join the Magic Academy, where they would learn how to use Magic to save the world.
